sn38.14:4.1: “Reverend Sāriputta, they speak of this thing called ‘suffering’.
sn38.14:4.3: “Reverend, there are these three forms of suffering.
sn38.14:4.4: The suffering inherent in painful feeling; the suffering inherent in conditions; and the suffering inherent in perishing.
sn38.14:4.5: These are the three forms of suffering.”
sn38.14:4.6: “But, reverend, is there a path and a practice for completely understanding these three forms of suffering?”
